title: Ep. 27 And Then There Were Two
description:
Kiki & Medinah hold down the fort after Shayla dumps us for a European Excursion.
This week we discuss the ATL Orgy, Chuck Berry's farts, Ratchet love octagons from As The Hood Turns, and what to do when you get pregnant by your best friend's man. There's more...that's just a taste.
